com.mygdx.hanto.implementation.common

Interface PieceMoveStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlyStrategy, WalkStrategy

    public interface PieceMoveStrategy
    This interface specifies the specific moving strategy behaviors for different hanto pieces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canIMove(Coordinate from, Coordinate to)
      This function checks if the moving is valid according to the movement strategy of the hanto piece.

    • Method Detail

      • canIMove

        boolean canIMove(Coordinate from,
                 Coordinate to)
        This function checks if the moving is valid according to the movement strategy of the hanto piece.
        Parameters:
        from - the coordinate where the piece from
        to - the coordinate where the piece to go
        Returns:
        true if it is valid to move from 'from' to 'to'
